Webhooks

In your settings (you'll need to be logged in), if you supply a webhook URL, Landline will POST every message it receives to that URL for further processing. This allows you to do custom things like email uses who are @-mentioned, analyze your chat inputs/frequency, etc.

The request data is a JSON payload that looks like

{
  "webhook_type": "message",
  "message": [some message here]
}

We're working quickly to support a more flexible webhook implementation, and we'd love to hear your ideas/needs or to review your pull requests.

Landline is being built with ❤ on Assembly
